summary: Soldiers undertake the perilous task of removing a stockpile of World War II bombshells discovered during roadworks under the ground of a small village.
cast: Oleg Borisov|Aleksey Alekseev|Pyotr Lyubeshkin|Oleg Mokshantsev|Vladimir Marenkov|Igor Kosukhin|Leonid Kuravlyov|Stanislav Lyubshin|Aleksei Smirnov|Nina Golovina|Aleksey Dobronravov|Aleksandr Gordon|Andrei Tarkovsky
director: Directors: Aleksandr Gordon (as A. Gordon), Andrei Tarkovsky (as A. Tarkovsky)
